topic.title: Searching for furry image galleries
topic.body: Is there a zite for furry artwork like FurAffinity, e926, DeviantArt, SoFurry, FurryNetwork and/or Furrific?

1510543588_1KsguJRo4WBC2mtudEj83cTCpxVuC.body:
I played it. My favorite one was ~~senpai~~ ~~kitten~~ the Leopard Cat.

I'm used to 2D fast-paced games like 20XX, SMW, Sonic 3 and alike; I'm the guy who wants buttons to smash. I've never played a visual novel before, so I skipped most dialogues after some point by almost breaking my mouse button.
